entry.title: Monday: Chance of showers. High 9. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers late this morning. A few showers this afternoon. Amount 2 to 4 mm. Wind becoming north 20 km/h this morning. High 9. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Monday 8 May 2023
